body_html:
What happens if you try to run this command:

cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py

in <root>/bazel-tensorflow, or, equivalently, in /local.mnt/vol1/development/alexander/.cache/bazel/_bazel_alexande/44250d582377ce08fbe503824f986778/tensorflow? My suspicion is that cp silently fails for some reason. If that works, try

/bin/bash -c 'source tools/genrule/genrule-setup.sh; cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py' in the same directory.
body_text:
What happens if you try to run this command:
cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py
in <root>/bazel-tensorflow, or, equivalently, in /local.mnt/vol1/development/alexander/.cache/bazel/_bazel_alexande/44250d582377ce08fbe503824f986778/tensorflow? My suspicion is that cp silently fails for some reason. If that works, try
/bin/bash -c 'source tools/genrule/genrule-setup.sh; cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py' in the same directory.
body:
What happens if you try to run this command:

`cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py` 

in `<root>/bazel-tensorflow`, or, equivalently, in `/local.mnt/vol1/development/alexander/.cache/bazel/_bazel_alexande/44250d582377ce08fbe503824f986778/tensorflow`? My suspicion is that `cp` silently fails for some reason. If that works, try

`/bin/bash -c 'source tools/genrule/genrule-setup.sh; cp external/six_archive/six-1.10.0/six.py bazel-out/local_linux-fastbuild/genfiles/external/six_archive/six.py'` in the same directory.
